name: Just before Christmas
description:
;--------------------------;

JUST_BEFORE_CHRISTMAS.

Author: MrmediamanX of 3MX digital [2021].

;--------------------------;

Its that time once again, The annual Christmas themed game from 3MX digital. Stay safe out there and have a good one. MrmediamanX - out

GAMEPLAY:

Whack baddies and collect all presents,decorations and bells in this 

ps1 christmas themed collectathon and help Santa save the day ... again.

;--------------------------;

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys = Move

Z = Jump

X = Attack/Interact

Enter = pause

;--------------------------;
